userInfo.lunch: We are delighted to invite you to the exclusive launch of Abjadpolis, an interactive game designed to learn and engage children of Arab descent in Canada with their linguistic heritage.
userInfo.offers: Abjadpolis offers a captivating and immersive environment where children can embark on an exciting Arabic adventure. Through interactive activities and engaging storylines, they will:
userInfo.li2: Develop a love for the Arabic language in a fun and interactive way
